data.lyric:
[ti:1 step forward, 3 steps back (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:SOUR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]1 step forward, 3 steps back (Explicit) - Olivia Rodrigo
[00:03.65]Lyrics by：Olivia Rodrigo/Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:07.30]Composed by：Olivia Rodrigo/Taylor Swift/Jack Antonoff
[00:10.95]I called you on the phone today
[00:13.55]
[00:14.84]Just to ask you how you were
[00:17.45]
[00:19.43]All I did was speak normally
[00:22.14]
[00:23.96]Somehow I still struck a nerve
[00:26.39]
[00:27.93]You got me f**ked up in the head boy
[00:30.89]
[00:32.39]Never doubted myself so much
[00:35.43]
[00:36.67]Like am I pretty
[00:37.83]Am I fun boy
[00:39.47]
[00:41.08]I hate that I gave you power over that kind of stuff
[00:45.01]
[00:45.70]'Cause it's always one step forward and three steps back
[00:51.48]
[00:52.57]I'm the love of your life until I make you mad
[00:58.01]It's always one step forward and three steps back
[01:03.44]
[01:04.18]Do you love me want me hate me
[01:06.65]Boy I don't understand
[01:09.47]No I don't understand
[01:11.64]
[01:13.27]And maybe in some masochistic way
[01:16.35]
[01:17.58]I kind of find it all exciting
[01:20.57]Like which lover will I get today
[01:24.64]Will you walk me to the door or send me home cryin'
[01:28.92]It's one step forward and three steps back
[01:33.81]
[01:34.63]I'm the love of your life until I make you mad
[01:39.94]It's always one step forward and three steps back
[01:45.11]
[01:45.95]Do you love me want me hate me
[01:48.40]Boy I don't understand
[01:51.16]No it's back and forth did I say somethin' wrong
[01:57.25]It's back and forth goin' over everything I said
[02:02.75]It's back and forth did I do somethin' wrong
[02:07.97]It's back and forth maybe this is all your fault
[02:12.56]Instead it's one step forward and three steps back
[02:18.11]
[02:18.98]And I'd leave you but the roller coaster's all I've ever had
[02:24.10]
[02:24.70]Yeah it's one step forward and three steps back
[02:29.70]
[02:30.66]Do you love me want me hate me
[02:33.12]Boy I don't understand
[02:35.39]
[02:36.32]No I don't understand
data.trans:
[ti:1 step forward, 3 steps back (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:SOUR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.65]//
[00:07.30]//
[00:10.95]今天 我给你打去电话
[00:13.55]
[00:14.84]只想问问你的近况
[00:17.45]
[00:19.43]我所做的只是故作镇定地闲聊而已
[00:22.14]
[00:23.96]不知何故 我依然触到痛处
[00:26.39]
[00:27.93]你让我不知所措 男孩
[00:30.89]
[00:32.39]我从未如此怀疑过自己
[00:35.43]
[00:36.67]比如说 我是否美丽动人
[00:37.83]我是否幽默风趣 男孩
[00:39.47]
[00:41.08]我讨厌我给予你能够凌驾于一切之上的权力
[00:45.01]
[00:45.70]因为这一切总是前进一步却后退三步
[00:51.48]
[00:52.57]我是你此生的挚爱 直到我让你大发雷霆
[00:58.01]这一切总是前进一步却后退三步
[01:03.44]
[01:04.18]你是否爱我 你是否渴望拥有我 你是否怨恨我
[01:06.65]男孩 我并不明白
[01:09.47]我并不明白
[01:11.64]
[01:13.27]也许是以一种自讨苦吃的方式
[01:16.35]
[01:17.58]我有点觉得这充满刺激
[01:20.57]今天我会遇见哪一位爱人
[01:24.64]你是陪我走到家门口 还是让我痛哭流涕地回家
[01:28.92]这就是前进一步却后退三步
[01:33.81]
[01:34.63]我是你此生的挚爱 直到我让你大发雷霆
[01:39.94]这一切总是前进一步却后退三步
[01:45.11]
[01:45.95]你是否爱我 你是否渴望拥有我 你是否怨恨我
[01:48.40]男孩 我并不明白
[01:51.16]这是徘徊不定 我是否说错了话
[01:57.25]这是徘徊不定 忘记我说过的话
[02:02.75]这是徘徊不定 我是否做错了什么
[02:07.97]这是徘徊不定 也许这都是你的错
[02:12.56]正相反 这就是前进一步却后退三步
[02:18.11]
[02:18.98]我决定离开你 但是心情起伏不定是我拥有的一切
[02:24.10]
[02:24.70]这就是前进一步却后退三步
[02:29.70]
[02:30.66]你是否爱我 你是否渴望拥有我 你是否怨恨我
[02:33.12]男孩 我并不明白
[02:35.39]
[02:36.32]我并不明白
